text: Moisten the rim of the cocktail glass with sugar syrup or a little of the schnapps. Dip the rim of the glass in red and green sugar to create a sweet and colorful rim. Mix the vodka, white chocolate liqueur, and peppermint schnapps with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well then add half-and-half and strain into the chilled martini glass. Garnish with a small candy cane for a classy Christmas cocktail.  Finished.
